item.description:
Let’s get together and have a good old fashioned social event. (Perhaps a hearty welcome will help send the cold weather away!) Besides - networking and working together can only be enhanced by getting to know each other and building our connection.

This event will be for several of Trish's meetups – a great chance to cross-pollinate! You never know what creativity, innovation and provocative thoughts can come from the mix of social mission, entrepreneurship, arts, sustainability, spirituality and eros! For those of you that are single – wear a sticker on your badge to show your interest in meeting other singles. Join us for some great company, stimulating conversation and maybe even some groovy moves!

Please Bring EITHER: Something significant to share such as a good bottle of wine, an appetizer or dessert (no chips or bread unless part of an appetizer please!) OR $10 to contribute towards the food and drink I will be providing. (If you are unable to contribute for financial reasons please come anyway.) :)

Loose Schedule:

Conversation, Networking, General Schmoozing: 7-9pm

Dancing, Singing, Etc: 9-12am

Hanging out, Telling Jokes, Etc: 12am til….

Hope you can make it!

Feel free to call 413-320-3991 or email me if you have any questions.  Feel free to bring friends or significant others.
item.name: Summer Kick-off Party
